CustomField.formula: IF( Close_Time__c - Open_Time__c > 0 , TEXT( FLOOR( Close_Time__c - Open_Time__c ) ) & " days " & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (Close_Time__c - Open_Time__c ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hrs " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (Close_Time__c - Open_Time__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " min", "" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the total time elapsed between Open Time and Close Time
CustomField.label: Total Time Elapsed (hh:mm)
